title: Moduli of sheaves and deformation to the normal cone
summary: Given a closed immersion between arbitrary smooth complex projective varieties, we prove that the two operations: (1) taking the moduli space of stable sheaves, and (2) taking the deformation to the normal cone, commute in a precise sense. In the case of curves inside symplectic surfaces, previously studied by Donagi-Ein-Lazarsfeld, the corresponding deformation to the normal cone space is an open subset of the relative moduli space of sheaves. As an application, we show generalized Kummer varieties degenerate to natural symplectic subvarieties of the Hitchin system for curves of genus at least 2.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在任意光滑复射影簇的闭浸入中，稳定层模空间的构造与法锥形变这两个操作是可交换的。对于辛曲面中的曲线情形，法锥形变空间是相对层模空间的子集。应用表明广义Kummer簇可退化到亏格至少为2的曲线的Hitchin系统的自然辛子簇。
AI.motivation: 研究闭浸入下稳定层模空间构造与法锥形变操作的交换性，特别关注辛曲面中曲线的情形，并探索广义Kummer簇的退化行为。
AI.method: 通过数学证明建立闭浸入情形下稳定层模空间与法锥形变操作的交换关系，分析辛曲面中曲线对应的相对模空间结构。
AI.result: 证明了稳定层模空间构造与法锥形变操作在闭浸入下可交换，在辛曲面曲线情形中法锥形变空间是相对层模空间的子集，广义Kummer簇可退化到Hitchin系统的辛子簇。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了模空间构造与形变操作的交换性理论，为理解广义Kummer簇等几何对象的退化行为提供了新的视角和工具。

title: Invariant and Coinvariant Morse Homologies for Orbifolds
summary: In this note, we construct invariant and coinvariant Morse chain complexes with integer coefficients for any compact effective orbifold. We conjecture that the homology of the coinvariant chain complex computes the homology of the underlying topological space over $\Z$, improving a construction of \cite{cho2014orbifold}, which is isomorphic to the homology of the underlying topological space over $\Q$. In contrast, the homology of the invariant Morse chain complex is sensitive to the orbifold structure itself.

AI.tldr: 该论文为紧致有效轨形构造了具有整数系数的协变和不变Morse链复形，推测协变链复形的同调计算底层拓扑空间的整数同调，改进了之前的有理同调结果。
AI.motivation: 改进Cho等人(2014)的轨形Morse同调构造，从有理系数扩展到整数系数，从而更精确地捕捉轨形的拓扑信息。
AI.method: 构造紧致有效轨形的协变和不变Morse链复形，使用整数系数而非有理系数。
AI.result: 协变链复形的同调推测计算底层拓扑空间的整数同调，不变链复形的同调对轨形结构本身敏感。
AI.conclusion: 该构造为轨形提供了更精细的整数同调理论，不变链复形能反映轨形结构的特异性。

title: On a Computational Approach to the Nash Blowup Problem
summary: In this paper we describe the implementation that led to the counterexamples to the Nash blowup conjectures recently discovered by the authors. We also provide new examples of toric varieties with prescribed singularities that are not resolved by the normalized Nash blowup, including cyclic quotient singularities, toric hypersurfaces, and Q-factorial Gorenstein singularities. In addition, we report extensive computational evidence: tens of thousands of two-dimensional toric varieties that are resolved by iterating the Nash blowup, and millions of three-dimensional toric varieties that are resolved by iterating the normalized Nash blowup. This provides positive evidence for the remaining open cases of the conjectures.

AI.tldr: 本文提供了纳什爆破猜想的反例实现，并展示了更多无法通过归一化纳什爆破解决奇点的环面簇例子，同时通过大量计算数据为猜想的开放情况提供了正面证据。
AI.motivation: 研究纳什爆破猜想，提供反例并探索环面簇奇点解析的边界条件。
AI.method: 实现纳什爆破猜想的反例构造，分析环面簇包括循环商奇点、环面超曲面和Q-因子Gorenstein奇点，并进行大规模数值计算验证。
AI.result: 发现了纳什爆破猜想的反例，提供了无法通过归一化纳什爆破解析的新环面簇例子，并通过数万个二维和数百万个三维环面簇的计算数据支持了猜想的开放情况。
AI.conclusion: 纳什爆破猜想在某些情况下不成立，但大量计算数据表明在迭代纳什爆破或归一化纳什爆破下，许多环面簇奇点仍可被解析，为猜想的剩余开放情况提供了正面证据。

title: Instanton dimensions of knot surgeries over arbitrary fields
comment: 39 pages, no figures. Comments are welcome
summary: Suppose $K \subset S^3$ is a knot and suppose $p$ and $q$ are co-prime integers with $q\ge 1$. For any field $\mathbb{K}$, we establish a dimension formula for the framed instanton homology of knot surgeries: $$ \dim I^\sharp(S^3_{p/q}(K); \mathbb{K}) = q \cdot r_{\mathbb{K}}(K) + |p - q \cdot ν^\sharp_{\mathbb{K}}(K)| $$ for certain integers $r_{\mathbb{K}}(K)$ and $ν^\sharp_{\mathbb{K}}(K)$, except possibly when $p/q = ν^\sharp_{\mathbb{K}}(K)$ and $ν^\sharp_{\mathbb{K}}(K)$ is even. This formula generalizes the result of Baldwin--Sivek from the case $\mathbb{K} = \mathbb{C}$ to arbitrary fields. Based on the result for $\mathbb{K} = \mathbb{Z}/2$, we obtain that $S^3_{p/q}(K)$ is not $SU(2)$-abelian for any knot $K$ other than the unknot and the right-handed trefoil whenever $p/q \in [0,6)$ and $p \in \{ a^e, 2a^e \}$ for some prime number $a$ and natural number $e$, thereby extending existing results for $p/q \in [0,5]$ and $p = a^e$. A byproduct of the techniques developed in this paper is that we generalize the distance-two surgery exact triangle by Culler--Daemi--Xie and Daemi--Miller-Eismeier--Lidman from $\mathbb{Z}/2$ coefficients to any coefficient ring.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了关于结手术的框架瞬子同调维数公式，将Baldwin-Sivek的结果从复数域推广到任意域，并基于此证明了某些结手术不是SU(2)-阿贝尔的。
AI.motivation: 研究结手术的框架瞬子同调维数，将已有结果从复数域推广到任意域，并探索其在判断结手术是否为SU(2)-阿贝尔方面的应用。
AI.method: 建立结手术的框架瞬子同调维数公式，使用特定整数r_𝕂(K)和ν^♯_𝕂(K)，并将Culler-Daemi-Xie和Daemi-Miller-Eismeier-Lidman的距离二手术精确三角形从ℤ/2系数推广到任意系数环。
AI.result: 证明了维数公式：dim I^♯(S^3_{p/q}(K); 𝕂) = q·r_𝕂(K) + |p - q·ν^♯_𝕂(K)|，除特定情况外。基于𝕂=ℤ/2的结果，证明了对于除平凡结和右手三叶结外的任何结，当p/q∈[0,6)且p满足特定条件时，S^3_{p/q}(K)不是SU(2)-阿贝尔的。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了结手术框架瞬子同调的维数公式，将结果从复数域推广到任意域，并扩展了关于SU(2)-阿贝尔性的现有结果。同时发展了将距离二手术精确三角形推广到任意系数环的技术。

title: Flexibility criterion for affine horospherical varieties
summary: In this paper we obtain a criterion of flexibility for an affine complexity-zero horospherical variety. This result generalizes previously known results on flexibility of normal horospherical varieties, horospherical varieties with an action of a semisimple group, and non-normal toric varieties.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了判断仿射复杂度为零的球面齐性空间灵活性的准则，推广了先前关于正规球面齐性空间、半单群作用的球面齐性空间以及非正规环面簇的灵活性结果。
AI.motivation: 研究球面齐性空间的灵活性，特别是仿射复杂度为零的情况，以扩展对这类代数簇灵活性的理解。
AI.method: 通过建立灵活性准则，推广先前已知的结果到更一般的球面齐性空间类别。
AI.result: 获得了仿射复杂度为零的球面齐性空间灵活性的判别准则。
AI.conclusion: 该准则统一并推广了多个先前已知的灵活性结果，为球面齐性空间的研究提供了新的工具。

title: Additivity of Crossing Number via Restricted Reidemeister Moves
summary: We define a set of restricted Reidemeister moves and show that if $K$ is obtained from $K_0\,\#\,K_1$ using those moves, then the crossing number of $K$ is at least $c(K_0)+c(K_1)$. We also explore topological interpretations of this result.

AI.tldr: 定义了受限Reidemeister移动集合，证明若结K通过这些移动从K0#K1获得，则其交叉数至少为c(K0)+c(K1)，并探讨结果的拓扑解释
AI.motivation: 研究结理论中交叉数在受限Reidemeister移动下的行为，特别是连接和操作对交叉数的影响
AI.method: 定义受限Reidemeister移动集合，分析这些移动如何影响结的交叉数，特别是从连接和K0#K1出发的情况
AI.result: 证明若结K通过受限Reidemeister移动从K0#K1获得，则其交叉数c(K) ≥ c(K0) + c(K1)
AI.conclusion: 受限Reidemeister移动保持连接和的交叉数下界，这为结理论中的交叉数研究提供了新的工具和拓扑解释

title: Bi-H"older invariants in o-minimal structures
summary: We prove that for any two definable germs in a polynomially bounded o-minimal structure, there exists a critical threshold $α_0 \in (0,1)$ such that if these germs are bi-$α$-H"older equivalent for some $α\ge α_0$, then they satisfy the following: \begin{itemize}[label=$\circ$] \item The Lipschitz normal embedding (LNE) property is preserved; that is, if one germ is LNE then so is the other; \item Their tangent cones have the same dimension; \item The links of their tangent cones have isomorphic homotopy groups. \end{itemize} As an application, we show that a complex analytic germ that is bi-$α$-H"older homeomorphic to the germ of a Euclidean space for some $α$ sufficiently close to $1$ must be smooth. This provides a slightly stronger version of Sampaio's smoothness theorem, in which the germs are assumed to be bi-$α$-H"older homeomorphic for every $α\in (0,1)$.

AI.tldr: 证明了在多项式有界o-极小结构中，两个可定义芽在某个临界阈值α₀以上是双α-Hölder等价时，会保持LNE性质、切锥维数相同、切锥链的同伦群同构。应用表明，复解析芽与欧氏空间芽在α足够接近1时双α-Hölder同胚，则必为光滑芽。
AI.motivation: 研究双α-Hölder等价在临界阈值以上时对几何和拓扑性质的保持性，特别是对Sampaio光滑性定理的强化。
AI.method: 使用多项式有界o-极小结构理论，分析可定义芽的双α-Hölder等价性，建立临界阈值α₀的存在性，并研究几何拓扑性质的保持。
AI.result: 证明了存在临界阈值α₀∈(0,1)，当α≥α₀时：LNE性质保持、切锥维数相同、切锥链同伦群同构。应用得到复解析芽在α足够接近1时与欧氏空间芽双α-Hölder同胚则必光滑。
AI.conclusion: 双α-Hölder等价在临界阈值以上能保持重要的几何拓扑性质，为Sampaio定理提供了更强的版本，仅需某个α足够接近1而非所有α∈(0,1)。

title: Prime theta-curves on minimal genus Seifert surfaces
summary: We prove that each prime knot union an essential arc on a minimal genus Seifert surface is a prime theta-curve.

AI.tldr: 证明每个素纽结与最小亏格Seifert曲面上的本质弧的并集构成素θ曲线
AI.motivation: 研究素纽结与Seifert曲面上本质弧的组合结构，探索素θ曲线的构造方法
AI.method: 通过数学证明方法，分析素纽结与最小亏格Seifert曲面上本质弧的并集结构
AI.result: 成功证明每个这样的并集确实构成素θ曲线
AI.conclusion: 素纽结与最小亏格Seifert曲面上本质弧的并集是素θ曲线，这为θ曲线的构造提供了新的途径

title: Stabilization of intersection Betti numbers for moduli spaces of one-dimensional sheaves on surfaces
summary: In this paper, we study the intersection cohomology of the moduli space of semistable one-dimensional sheaves with fixed Euler characteristic, supported in a divisor class $β$ on a smooth projective surface $S$. Assuming that this moduli space is irreducible, we prove that its intersection Betti numbers in a certain range are determined by a product formula derived from Göttsche's formula for Betti numbers of Hilbert schemes of points on $S$. As an application, for Enriques and bielliptic surfaces, we show the stabilization of intersection Betti numbers of this moduli space when $β$ is sufficiently positive. In the Enriques case, we also prove a refined stabilization result concerning the perverse Hodge numbers when the moduli space is smooth.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了光滑射影曲面上具有固定欧拉特征的一维半稳定层模空间的相交上同调，证明了在一定范围内的相交Betti数由Göttsche公式决定，并在Enriques和双椭圆曲面上证明了当除子类足够正时相交Betti数的稳定性。
AI.motivation: 研究一维半稳定层模空间的相交上同调性质，特别是Betti数的乘积公式和稳定性问题，为理解这类模空间的拓扑结构提供理论支持。
AI.method: 假设模空间不可约，利用Göttsche公式推导相交Betti数的乘积公式，并在Enriques和双椭圆曲面上分析当除子类足够正时的稳定性行为。
AI.result: 证明了相交Betti数在一定范围内由乘积公式决定，在Enriques和双椭圆曲面上展示了相交Betti数的稳定性，在Enriques情形下还证明了光滑模空间的精细perverse Hodge数稳定性。
AI.conclusion: 一维半稳定层模空间的相交上同调具有乘积公式和稳定性特征，特别是在Enriques和双椭圆曲面上表现出良好的拓扑性质。

title: Separability criteria for loops via the Goldman bracket
summary: We provide some explicit algebraic criteria in terms of the Goldman bracket to decide whether two free homotopy classes of loops on an oriented surface admit disjoint representatives. We extend Kabiraj's method using the hyperbolic geometry of surfaces to prove these criteria. As an application, we show that the center of the Goldman Lie algebra of a pair of pants is generated by the class of the constant loop together with the classes of loops that wind multiple times around a single puncture or boundary component. This case was not covered by Kabiraj, since a pair of pants is not filled by simple closed curves.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了基于Goldman括号的代数准则来判断曲面上的两个自由同伦类环路是否可以有不相交代表元，并证明了这些准则。作为应用，证明了裤子曲面的Goldman李代数的中心由常数环路类以及绕单个穿孔或边界分量多次环绕的环路类生成。
AI.motivation: Kabiraj的方法仅适用于被简单闭曲线填充的曲面，而裤子曲面不满足这一条件，因此需要扩展方法来处理这类情况。
AI.method: 扩展Kabiraj的方法，利用曲面的双曲几何来证明基于Goldman括号的代数准则。
AI.result: 建立了判断两个自由同伦类环路是否可以有不相交代表元的显式代数准则，并确定了裤子曲面Goldman李代数中心的具体生成元。
AI.conclusion: 成功将Kabiraj的方法扩展到裤子曲面这类不被简单闭曲线填充的曲面，并完整描述了其Goldman李代数中心的结构。

title: Hilbert properties of varieties
summary: This is a survey of results on the Hilbert property of algebraic varieties, and variants of it.

AI.tldr: 关于代数簇的希尔伯特性质及其变体的结果综述
AI.motivation: 系统整理和总结代数簇希尔伯特性质及其相关变体的研究成果
AI.method: 采用综述方法，收集和分析该领域的已有研究成果
AI.result: 提供了代数簇希尔伯特性质及其变体的全面概览
AI.conclusion: 该综述为研究代数簇希尔伯特性质提供了系统的参考框架

title: Framed instanton homology and Frøyshov's invariant
summary:
We determine the framed instanton homology with coefficients in $\mathbb F = \mathbb Z/2$ for Dehn surgeries on a knot in the $3$-sphere. The dimension of these groups is seen to have a close relationship with a homology cobordism invariant due to Froyshov.
  As an application, we show that $r$-surgery on a non-trivial knot cannot be nondegenerate $SU(2)$-abelian for any $|r| \le 4\lceil g(K)/2\rceil$, which is $2g(K)$ for $g$ even and $2g(K) + 2$ for $g$ odd.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了3-球面中结的Dehn手术的带框架瞬子同调，并建立了其维度与Froyshov同调配边不变量之间的关系。应用表明，非平凡结的r-手术在|r|≤4⌈g(K)/2⌉范围内不能是非退化SU(2)-阿贝尔的。
AI.motivation: 研究结的Dehn手术的瞬子同调性质，特别是其维度与已知同调配边不变量的关系，以了解手术流形的拓扑和几何结构。
AI.method: 使用带框架瞬子同调理论，在F=Z/2系数下计算Dehn手术的瞬子同调群，并分析其维度与Froyshov不变量的关联。
AI.result: 确定了Dehn手术的瞬子同调维度与Froyshov同调配边不变量存在密切关系，并证明了非平凡结的r-手术在特定范围内不能是非退化SU(2)-阿贝尔的。
AI.conclusion: 通过瞬子同调方法建立了结手术的拓扑约束，为理解手术流形的几何性质提供了新的工具和视角。

title: On Endomorphisms of Projective Algebraic Varieties
summary: We study the algebraic dynamics of endomorphisms of projective varieties. First, we characterize their iterated images, i.e. the intersection of the images of their iterates. Next, we explore the Stein factorizations of the iterates, proving some stability phenomena they exhibit. Finally, we study endomorphisms whose iterates lie in a finite union of connected components of the endomorphism scheme, thereby completing a result of Brion.

AI.tldr: 研究了射影簇自同态的代数动力学，包括迭代像的特征、迭代的Stein分解稳定性，以及迭代位于自同态概形有限连通分支并中的自同态。
AI.motivation: 深入理解射影簇自同态的代数动力学性质，包括迭代像的行为、Stein分解的稳定性，以及迭代在自同态概形中的分布规律。
AI.method: 采用代数几何方法，分析自同态的迭代像交集，研究迭代映射的Stein分解的稳定性现象，并探讨迭代位于有限连通分支并的自同态。
AI.result: 刻画了自同态迭代像的特征，证明了Stein分解的稳定性现象，完成了Brion关于迭代位于有限连通分支并的自同态的结果。
AI.conclusion: 系统地研究了射影簇自同态的代数动力学性质，在迭代像、Stein分解稳定性和自同态概形结构方面取得了重要进展。

title: On finiteness properties of separating semigroup of real curve
summary:
A real morphism $f$ from a real algebraic curve $X$ to $\mathbb{P}^1$ is called \emph{separating} if $f^{-1}(\mathbb{R} \mathbb{P}^1) = \mathbb{R} X$. A separating morphism defines a covering $\mathbb{R} X \to \mathbb{R} \mathbb{P}^1$. Let $X_1, \ldots, X_r$ denote the components of $\mathbb{R} X$. M. Kummer and K. Shaw~\cite{kummer_separating_2020} defined the separating semigroup of a curve $X$ as the set of all vectors $d(f) = (d_1(f), \ldots, d_r(f)) \in \mathbb{N}^{r}$ where $f$ is a separating morphism $X \to \mathbb{P}^1$ and $d_i(f)$ is the degree of the restriction of $f$ to $X_i$.
  Let us call an additive subsemigroup of $\mathbb{N}^{r}$ \emph{finitely covered} if it can be written as $S = S_0 \cup \bigcup_{i=1}^{m} (s_i + \mathbb{N}_{0}^{r})$, where $S_0$ is a finite set. In the present paper, we prove that the separating semigroup of a real curve $X$ is finitely covered, but not finitely generated when $\mathbb{R} X$ has at least two connected components.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了实代数曲线的分离半群是有限覆盖的，但当实曲线至少有两个连通分支时不是有限生成的。
AI.motivation: 研究实代数曲线到射影直线的分离态射的度数组所构成的半群的结构性质，特别是其生成性和覆盖性。
AI.method: 通过定义分离态射和分离半群，引入有限覆盖半群的概念，并利用实代数几何和半群理论的方法进行证明。
AI.result: 证明了分离半群是有限覆盖的，但当实曲线至少有两个连通分支时不是有限生成的。
AI.conclusion: 实代数曲线的分离半群具有有限覆盖性这一良好性质，但在多连通分支情况下缺乏有限生成性。

title: Instantons on the Blown-up Surface and the Affine Vertex Algebra
summary:
Vafa-Witten observed that Yoshioka's blow-up formula for the Euler characteristics of rank $r$ instantons on an algebraic surface coincides with the character of the Wess-Zumino-Witten model for $\mathrm{SU}(r)$ at level $1$, and raised the question of finding a rational conformal field theory explanation for this striking coincidence. In this work, we provide an answer to this question by constructing and analyzing the affine $\mathrm{gl}_r$ action on various cohomology theories, including the Grothendieck group of coherent sheaves, Hochschild homology, Chow groups, and Hodge cohomology, of the moduli space of stable sheaves on a blown-up surface.
  A key ingredient in our proof is a representation-theoretic reformulation of the theory of Grassmannians of Tor-amplitude $[0,1]$-perfect complexes studied by the first-named author in terms of the spin representation of the finite-dimensional Clifford algebra. This may be viewed as a finite analog of the question of Vafa-Witten via the Boson-Fermion correspondence.

AI.tldr: 该论文通过构造仿射gl_r作用在各种上同调理论上，为Vafa-Witten关于Yoshioka的blow-up公式与SU(r) WZW模型特征之间惊人巧合的问题提供了有理共形场论解释。
AI.motivation: Vafa-Witten观察到Yoshioka的blow-up公式与SU(r) WZW模型在level 1的特征一致，提出了寻找有理共形场论解释的问题。
AI.method: 构造和分析仿射gl_r作用在多种上同调理论上，包括相干层的Grothendieck群、Hochschild同调、Chow群和Hodge上同调。关键工具是将Grassmannian理论重新表述为有限维Clifford代数的旋量表示。
AI.result: 成功建立了blow-up公式与有理共形场论之间的联系，为Vafa-Witten问题提供了数学解释。
AI.conclusion: 通过仿射代数作用和旋量表示理论，为代数曲面上稳定层模空间的blow-up公式与WZW模型特征之间的巧合提供了完整的共形场论解释。

title: Point Objects and Derived Equivalences of Twisted Derived Categories of Abelian Varieties
summary: We study the notion of $1$-twisted semi-homogeneous vector bundles on $\mathbb{G}_m$-gerbes over abelian varieties, and classify point objects in the twisted derived categories of abelian varieties. As an application, we classify the twisted Fourier-Mukai partners of abelian varieties.

title: Powers of abelian varieties over $\overline{\mathbb Q(t)}$ not isogenous to a Jacobian
summary: We prove the existence of abelian varieties over $\overline{\mathbb Q(t)}$ with no power isogenous to a Jacobian. Moreover, given a positive integer $N$, we prove the existence of abelian varieties over $\overline{\mathbb Q(t)}$ with maximal monodromy such that the $n$th power is not isogenous to a Jacobian for $n \leq N$. We make use of an Arakelov inequality established by Lu and Zuo, as well as intersection theoretic methods, to prove our main results.

AI.tldr: 证明了在代数闭域上存在不与任何雅可比簇等幂的阿贝尔簇，并且对于任意正整数N，存在具有最大单值性的阿贝尔簇，其n次幂在n≤N时都不与雅可比簇等幂。
AI.motivation: 研究阿贝尔簇与雅可比簇之间的等幂关系，探索在代数闭域上是否存在不与雅可比簇等幂的阿贝尔簇。
AI.method: 利用Lu和Zuo建立的Arakelov不等式，结合交集理论方法证明主要结果。
AI.result: 成功证明了在代数闭域上存在不与任何雅可比簇等幂的阿贝尔簇，并且对于任意正整数N，存在具有最大单值性的阿贝尔簇，其n次幂在n≤N时都不与雅可比簇等幂。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为阿贝尔簇与雅可比簇的等幂关系提供了新的理论结果，展示了在代数闭域上存在不与雅可比簇等幂的阿贝尔簇的存在性。

title: Deformation to the normal bundle and blow-ups via derived Weil restrictions
summary: We develop an analogue of the deformation to the normal cone in the context of derived algebraic geometry. This provides any given morphism of derived stacks with a degeneration to the zero section of its normal bundle (i.e., its 1-shifted relative tangent bundle). The construction is realized via the derived Weil restriction along the zero section of the affine line. We prove a general algebraicity theorem for derived Weil restrictions along finite but possibly non-flat morphisms. As an application of the theory, we study derived blow-ups along arbitrary closed centres, generalizing previous works of the authors in the quasi-smooth case.

AI.tldr: 本文在导出代数几何中发展了法锥形变的类似物，将任意导出叠态射退化为其法丛的零截面。通过仿射直线零截面的导出Weil限制实现构造，并证明了有限但可能非平坦态射的导出Weil限制的代数性定理。应用包括沿任意闭中心的导出爆破。
AI.motivation: 在导出代数几何中建立法锥形变的对应物，为任意导出叠态射提供退化到其法丛零截面的工具，推广经典代数几何中的形变理论。
AI.method: 通过仿射直线零截面的导出Weil限制构造退化，并证明有限非平坦态射下导出Weil限制的代数性定理。
AI.result: 成功构造了导出叠态射到其法丛零截面的退化，建立了导出Weil限制的代数性理论，并将导出爆破推广到任意闭中心情形。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为导出代数几何提供了重要的形变工具，统一了经典代数几何中的法锥形变理论，并在导出爆破等应用中展现了广泛适用性。
